_description: Inducements to repentance — four short lines translating a Latin text

BLHar7322.Transcription: Godes horeCristes loreGodes grisliche domand the blisse þat ner nis don
BLHar7322.Note: Set out to right of column of Latin text on the same subject, “benignitas diuina, Christi doctrina….”

Furnivall,  Frederick James,
